fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Slither outside somebody's house at night, scaring them and anyone who visits them tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You always know who is scared.
- Scared people are not told they are scared, but their ability has no effect the night they are scared and the following night.
- If you win, the game ends.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the Daily Streak Faction, your third attribute does not apply.
